entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning then northwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
